name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, it was reported online that a teacher at Jinan High-tech Experimental Middle School kicked, slapped, and even beat students with a mop in class.
On April 17, the Jinan High-tech Zone Education Bureau stated that the teacher physically punished the students because of their poor test scores.
"The teacher did something inappropriate, and a meeting is currently underway to discuss and deal with the matter."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the incident, the head teacher in the class group asked the student who spread the video to delete the video, confess and turn himself in, and "use your brain"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On the evening of April 16, a murder occurred at Tongling Vocational and Technical College
It is said that two men had a dispute over a washing machine, and one of them killed the other with a knife.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On April 12, Weifang Binhai District issued a notice that according to the "Weifang New Coronavirus Infection Epidemic Detection Supplementary Plan", party and government agencies, enterprises and institutions staff must undergo a "two-three-day test" for the new coronavirus nucleic acid after returning from abroad.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens from many places submitted articles, saying that they had recently received propaganda text messages about "keeping state secrets."
Relevant posters were posted on the Xiamen University campus

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On April 16, in a residential area in Nantong, Jiangsu Province,
an owner was slapped in the face by the property manager at the door of his home

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On April 17, the SpaceX official account was forcibly disconnected twice during the live broadcast of the launch.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens said that all the live broadcasts of Space X launching starships in China have been shut down.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up: After SpaceX announced the launch delay, the trending search on Weibo in China directly rushed to the top, sparking discussions among netizens

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @AuserNameyO Because I was beaten when I was young, I don’t think children today should still be beaten
